Obviously, noone under such conditions or circumstances will find this place to be constructive. Anyone who would be interested in this community would not complain about strange words they cannot understand, they would try to find the meaning of them on the internet and come back here to further educate themselves and perhaps earn some bucks in the way. Let us not judge OP, since this would happen to anyone of us if we were invited to a cheese forum while we are lactose intolerant.
